Name: LONN
About the game: LONN LONN is a first person, story, action-adventure physics VR game set in the year 2058. A world that is changing, where mankind is increasingly eclipsed, where every neuron, synapse and receptor in the human mind is being taken away; modified and replaced to create a future of cybernetic beings. Face adversity, face disappointment, never lose your grip on reality! Physics through and through Choose your own style of play. LONN is built from the bottom-up using our realistic Kinesis Physics System. Interact with the highly detailed world of LONN with consistency. Grab, Push, Pull, Climb, Jump, Crouch and Fight. Everything is your weapon. Unleash destruction through transforming weaponry and telekinetic abilities. Discover new ways to obliterate your enemies and purchase powerful upgrades that maximize abilities and customize your weaponry. Rich narrative, story driven campaign LONN features a full single-player campaign with challenging missions. Immerse yourself in deep environmental interactions, world exploration, puzzle solving, and visceral combat. Discover the skills and experiences, build friendships on the way to stop the destructive and dystopian force that is WUX-n. Loot through lockers to find digital currency to buy weapons and attachments. Use telekinesis to solve puzzles and destroy enemies with heavy objects. Toss any object to distract an enemy, then take them out by stabbing to the head. Tear off a Bombot from your face and throw it away before it self-destructs. Use parkour to sneak around an enemy with more freedom of movement. Arena and Parkour Game Modes Play Arena with hidden secrets and Parkour modes to experience visceral combat and free running in unique ways with new challenges. Replay Mode Unlock levels and play them again and again, using weapons of choice.
